root.description:
Hey @everyone! Here you can post your own CIA's (CTR Importable Archive's) to share with other people! Just paste the link of the file here! Recommended site's to post them to are [Google Drive](https://www.drive.google.com), [Onedrive](https://www.onedrive.live.com) and [Mediafire](https://www.mediafire.com). You can also search for CIA ROM's here using the following command:
``!cia (CIA Game name including spaces, quotes and numbers)``
For example:
``!cia Luigi's Mansion 2``
Output:
`` This is what I found: https://www.cia-3ds.com/2019/09/luigis-mansion-2.html``
QueryBot will search on [Cia-3DS.com](https://www.cia-3ds.com/) for the CIA game. Enjoy it!
